title: Van Aert Headlines Visma-Lease a Bike’s Mega-Squad to Back Sepp Kuss at Vuelta a España
content:
'I'm ready to lead the team.' 'GC Kuss' headlines a deep Visma-Lease a Bike, with Uijtdebroeks as co-captain, and Van Aert on stage-hunting rampage.

Read the full article at Van Aert Headlines Visma-Lease a Bike’s Mega-Squad to Back Sepp Kuss at Vuelta a España on Velo.
author: ahood
